author: 舒馨
title: 丹阳市实践"普法+"模式助力法治宣传"走新"更"走心"_法润江苏
text:
为构建法治宣传新生态，推动全市普法宣传更接地气、更入人心，今年以来，丹阳市司法局积极实践“普法+”模式，以形式创新与治理融合双向赋能，让法治种子在群众心中落地生根。
一是“普法+电影”，在光影品鉴中厚植法治信仰。针对春夏之交户外活动多的特点，丹阳市司法局联合电影公司在全市开展“法治电影村村行”活动，将电影屏幕搬到群众身边，用惠民暖心之举提升普法质效。精心选取《飞夺泸定桥勇士连》《依法治国专题片》等精彩且富有教育的影片，一方面，利用电影播放前后人员进场的时机，组织普法志愿者们向群众发放普法宣传册，讲解远程公证和法律援助等相关事宜，为有需要的群众提供法律咨询；另一方面，针对电影中的法治元素现场说“法”，特别是群众关心的婚姻家庭、土地承包、农民工权益保障等法律条文，切实增强普法穿透力和感染力。目前已在全市巡演60多场次，吸引12000余名群众参与，发放宣传资料20000余份。
二是“普法+巡讲”，在条分缕析中感悟法治力量。充分发挥普法志愿者和社会团体积极性，组织开展“丹心护花 法润万家”妇儿普法系列巡讲，用愿意听、听得懂的讲授方式让法治宣传活起来。组织市妇联、“五老”宣讲团、镇江八姑娘公益律师联盟丹阳团等公益团队，在国际家庭日、国际儿童节等普法节点走进村（社区）、学校等地开展普法讲座，聚焦婚姻家庭、未成年人保护等热点领域，运用大量数据和正反面案例解读《未成年人保护法》《家庭教育促进法》等法律，切实将法治阳光洒向乡村家庭与校园，引导弱势群体用法律武器捍卫合法权益。
三是“普法+游戏”，在寓教于乐中增进法治热情。致力将法治宣传融入社会活动多领域，汇聚成全民参与的 “交响乐”，让普法知识看得见、可参与、能体验。司徒司法所等多家基层司法所组织开展“法治套圈”等趣味活动，一方面，将“弃养的狗咬了人原主人要负责”、“胎儿在妈妈肚子里就能继承遗产”等与群众生活息息相关的法律知识印制在游戏道具上，将晦涩的法律条文转化为通俗易懂的“大白话”，让群众第一眼就能看得见、记得牢；另一方面，精心设置积分规则，将法治小礼品作为活动纪念品分发给参与者，吸引群众驻足研读、趣味打卡框旁、儿童拍照留念，让“学法”变得既轻松又有趣，营造全方位的普法氛围。
丹阳市司法局 葛陇怡

author: Movieguide®
title: Harrison Butker Breaks Silence on Commencement Speech Backlash: ‘Bold Witness for Christ’
text:
Harrison Butker Breaks Silence on Commencement Speech Backlash: ‘Bold Witness for Christ’
By Movieguide® Contributor
Kansas City Chiefs kicker Harrison Butker has finally broken the silence following his viral commencement speech at Benedictine College.
Movieguide® recently
reported on his speech:
During Butker’s
[speech]he “extolled the virtues of motherhood as he encouraged female graduates and other women in the audience to ‘disregard the outside noise’ that encourages them to prioritize their careers above everything else.”
“The majority of you are most excited about your marriage and the children you will bring into this world,” the kicker
, addressing the women who were graduating.
“I can tell you that my beautiful wife, Isabelle, would be the first to say that her life truly started when she began living her vocation as a wife and as a mother,” he
. “I’m on the stage today and able to be the man I am because I have a wife who leans into her vocation.”
“I’m beyond blessed with the many talents God has given me, but it cannot be overstated that all of my success is made possible because a girl I met in band class back in middle school would convert to the faith, become my wife, and embrace one of the most important titles of all: homemaker,” Butker
.
His initial speech also
called out President Biden and addressed abortion.
While he received immense backlash for his comments, many defended his position. At the
Regina Caeli Academy’s Courage Under Fire gala, Butker said he doesn’t regret standing up for what he believes.
“If it wasn’t clear that the timeless Catholic values are hated by many, it is now,” Butker
said at the gala in Nashville, Tennessee. “Over the past few days, my beliefs — or what people think I believe — have been the focus of countless discussions around the globe.”
“At the outset, many people expressed a shocking level of hate. But as the days went on, even those who disagreed with my viewpoints shared their support for my freedom of religion,” he
continued.
Butker does not “regret” his decision because his ultimate goal is not to please man but to please God.
“If we have truth and charity, we should trust in the Lord’s providence and let the Holy Ghost do the rest of the work,” Butker
explained. “Our love for Jesus and thus our desire to speak out should never be outweighed by the longing of our fallen nature to be loved by the world. Glorifying God and not ourselves should always remain our motivation despite any pushback or even support.”
“It is not people but Jesus Christ who I am trying to please,” he
added. “In reality, any courage I’ve shown will lead to some small suffering, and it will lead to some people maybe never liking me, but that could be God’s will. If I constantly remind myself of the hardships the saints went through, especially the martyrs in their persecution, it makes it all seem not so bad.”
“If heaven is our goal, we should embrace our cross, however large or small it may be, and live our life with joy to be a bold witness for Christ,” Butker
concluded.
Movieguide® previously
https://www.movieguide.org/news-articles/chiefs-kicker-harrison-butker-gives-vulnerable-unborn-a-voice-at-white-house-ceremony.html on Butker’s pro-life advocacy:
Kansas City Chief’s kicker, Harrison Butker was praised after he spoke on the importance of pro-life at the White House ceremony for the Super Bowl champions.
“I want to give the most vulnerable, the unborn, a voice at a place where every effort has been made to allow and normalize the tragic termination of their lives,” Christian Headlines
of Butker.
“As a father who has experienced three miscarriages, my wife and I understand the hardships that come with losing a child,” he added. “Every life is precious and should be valued whether outside or inside the womb.”
Butker was spotted endorsing a tie made by pro-life organization
[Live Action]. The tie contained the Latin phrase “Vulnerari Praesidio” on it, which means “protect the most vulnerable.”
Pro-life activist Anna Lulis
[tweeted]of Butker, Super Bowl champion, Harrison Butker ( [@buttkicker7]) wore a pro-life tie behind the most pro-abortion U.S. President, Joe Biden. The tie said PROTECT THE VULNERABLE in Latin. This is what real masculinity looks like, courageously standing up for the most vulnerable, the preborn.”
Share:

author: @odtnews
title: 'Lost touch': Mayor's reverse mortgage idea irks | Otago Daily Times Online News
text: You are not permitted to download, save or email this image. Visit [image gallery](/image_purchases) to purchase the image. Following deliberations on the council’s 2024-25 annual plan yesterday, Central Otago District Mayor Tim Cadogan confirmed to the Otago Daily Times he had, during drop-in sessions on the annual plan, suggested reverse mortgages could be used to pay for the rates increase. His suggestion was slammed by two submitters, one labelling it disturbing and the other saying it showed elected members were out of touch. Reverse mortgages allow older homeowners to borrow against the value of their home, the loan being repaid when the homeowner dies. Mr Cadogan said he had tried to offer a practical solution to ratepayers, given the present financial climate. "There were a number of times at drop-in sessions ... when pensioners explained to me the impact that these increases, alongside all the other financial challenges that they are facing, could lead to not heating their homes or cutting back on food. "I tried to be practical in responding to the situation these folk feared they would find themselves in and said, as a last measure, to meet the cost-of-living crisis they are facing, including the projected rates increases, they could consider reverse mortgages." While the suggestion was unpalatable for some, many people were "asset rich and cash poor". "Suggesting utilising some of that asset to make their lives better, to avoid cutting back on heating or food was, I feel, better than offering empty sympathy." Two submitters touched on the comments made at drop-in sessions by Mr Cadogan during deliberations in Alexandra yesterday. Former MP Gerry Eckhoff said he could not believe Mr Cadogan had suggested reverse mortgages. "I’ve also heard, and it’s very disturbing Mr Mayor, that you’ve actually ... suggested to some ratepayers — and I can’t believe this is true — that reverse mortgages are a good way to pay for your rates," he said. Submitter Trevor Goudie said the suggestion showed "elected members have lost touch with reality". Mr Cadogan did not respond to the comments during the meeting. Councillors heard 13 verbal submissions and considered over 150 written submissions on the annual plan. At the meeting, council chief executive Peter Kelly said the average proposed rates increase was about 18.4%, down from 21.4% as proposed in the draft annual plan. However, he accepted 18.4% was still a "terrible position to be in".

author: Commercialcleaning
title: Transforming Cleanliness: The Impact of North West's Top Commercial Cleaners
text:
In today’s dynamic world, the importance of maintaining a spotless and healthy workspace has been more important. Located in the heart of the North West, a region known for its busy cities and scenic landscapes, lies an overlooked hero of the business world: commercial cleaners. These experts are the backbone of maintaining immaculate work environments, contributing not just to aesthetics but also to health and productivity. In this post, we examine the world of commercial cleaners in the North West, exploring their vital role and why they should be at the forefront of every business owner’s mind.
The Core of Professional Cleaning
Commercial cleaning services are more than just the basics of dusting and mopping. They include a range of tasks tailored to the unique needs of each business, from deep cleaning carpets to sanitizing workstations. The cleaners in the North West are furnished with the latest tools and techniques, ensuring that every nook and cranny of your workplace is spotless. This level of cleanliness is not just about appearances; it's a commitment to providing a safe and healthy environment for employees and clients alike.
Why Opt for North West Cleaning Professionals?
Expertise and Experience: With years of experience, North West’s commercial cleaners bring a wealth of knowledge to every job. They are trained in the latest cleaning methods and use advanced equipment, ensuring effective cleaning.
Customised Solutions: Understanding that no two businesses are alike, these cleaners offer custom cleaning plans. Whether it’s a small office or a large industrial space, they have the capabilities and resources to meet your specific requirements.
Sustainable Practices: In an era where environmental consciousness is paramount, many North West cleaners adopt eco-friendly cleaning methods. This approach not only maintains hygiene but also helps in reducing your carbon footprint.
Health and Safety Compliance: These professionals are well-versed in health and safety regulations, ensuring that their cleaning practices meet the highest standards. This is especially crucial in industries where hygiene is paramount, such as healthcare and food service.
The Effect on Business
A clean workspace is not just about making a good impression. It has tangible benefits that can affect the bottom line of your business:
Boosts Productivity: A clean and organised environment can significantly enhance employee productivity and morale.
Reduces Illness: Regular cleaning reduces the spread of germs, leading to fewer sick days and a healthier workforce.
Protects Assets: Proper maintenance of your premises and equipment can increase their longevity, saving costs in the long run.
Choosing the Ideal Service
When selecting a commercial cleaner in the North West, consider the following:
Reputation: Look for cleaners with favorable reviews and testimonials.
Flexibility: Choose a service that can work around your business hours and specific needs.
Insurance: Ensure they are fully insured to protect against any accidental damage.
Cost: While cost is a factor, remember that the cheapest option is not always the best. Quality and reliability are paramount.
Final Thoughts: The Key Role of Commercial Cleaners
Commercial cleaners in the North West are more than just service providers; they are partners in your business’s success. By maintaining a clean and healthy workspace, they help create an environment where businesses can thrive. In choosing the right commercial cleaning service, you’re not just investing in cleanliness; you’re investing in the health, productivity, and longevity of your business.
Don't forget, a clean workspace is a productive workspace!

author: Charlotte Today
title: Looking to improve your diet, but not thrilled about all the cooking, now is a great time to try Maple Meal Prep! | wcnc.com
text:
CHARLOTTE, N.C. — In the kitchen this morning - we were talking meal prep in the New Year with a special focus on people 55 and older and diabetic friendly meals.
Joining us today was Kate Kingsley, owner and head chef at Maple Meal Prep.
According to their website: They are a meal preparation service dedicated to providing you with delicious and healthy food options. Their meals are made from scratch, with all ingredients and nutritional information clearly listed, to ensure that you feel good after every meal. Their primary objective is to assist individuals who lead busy lifestyles in eating wholesome food that will help them achieve their goals, maintain their well-being, and indulge in delicious flavors.
Maple Meal Prep, serves everyone from everyday people like you and me, to high-level athletes to mom and dad in the 55+ communities!
Owned, and run by a certified nutritionist, "you can be assured that we can deliver the right diet and food restrictions and or allowance to make sure that your diet is in accordance with your body” says Kingsley. She continues “diabetic and inflammatory options are no problem. Also we know that Taste is everything! Nothing leaves our kitchen unless it is Delicious! ” Here is how it works:
Step 1 CHOOSE YOUR MEALS : Select from a wide variety of meals that fit any and all diet preferences. Orders must be in by Thursday night to receive your meals Monday.
Step 2 COOK: Our staff will carefully prepare, cook, and package all of your meals and have them fresh and ready to go!
Step 3 PICKUP/DELIVERY: Choose how you would like to receive your meals. We offer both pickup at our partnered locations and delivery to the greater Charlotte area!
Step 4 HEAT IT AND EAT IT: Our containers are microwave So pop your meal directly in the microwave and enjoy your meal! If you prefer to heat in the oven, remove meal from container, place on an oven safe tray, heat and enjoy!
For more information and great meals visit MapleMealPrep.com
